description: Try our easy to follow Skull Dessert Pizza recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Skull Dessert Pizza Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cut strawberries and lolly snakes to use as decorations for the face, outlining the eyes in strawberry segments and forming a mouth with snakes.
